channel.title: Doubts about the tunnels ssh and the rogue nodes
channel.description:
Hello,
How i could anonymize the tor traffic using ssh? I would like to avoid malicious nodes ..
even if I have to pay the price about a larger fingerprint web compared to other users who don't use ssh along with tor..
I was looking for use ssh together with tor or be able to configure firefox then the Internet browsing is covered, I looked the link on the different tunnels and their configuration but it wasn't clear to me ..
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_SSH_before_Tor
if the tunnel ssh only anomynize the ssh session itself or all the traffic of a tor exit node?
Should i have a vps if i have to follow this configuration? (To the purpose to install ssh )
thank you very much

item.title: Doubts about the tunnels ssh and the rogue nodes
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
y010:

I looked the link on the different tunnels and their configuration but it wasn’t clear to me …

Not surprising as that page itself points out.

Advertisement:
Too difficult to set up? Provider specific automation can be created for you by the lead developer of Whonix ™. Send reasonable price suggestions. Get in contact.

Documentation for this is incomplete. Contributions are happily considered!

Advertisement:
It’s possible to pay for the completion of this wiki page. Send reasonable price suggestions. Get in contact.

That page btw is for
User → SSH → Tor → Internet

What you want though is the opposite sounds like.
User → Tor → SSH → Internet

But same applies, that page isn’t complete either.

Whonix

Tunnels/Connecting to Tor before SSH

Instructions on how to connect to Tor before SSH

y010:

Should i have a vps if i have to follow this configuration? (To the purpose to install ssh )

Which makes this another challenge and therefore also unpopular. Free SSH providers are very rare or even non-existing (didn’t check for years), and paying for these anonymously is difficult.

y010:

if the tunnel ssh only anomynize the ssh session itself or all the traffic of a tor exit node?

If properly setup (undocumented as per above) all traffic could go

How to connect to Tor before SSH ( User → Tor → SSH → Internet )

Read full topic
item.source: Doubts about the tunnels ssh and the rogue nodes
